coding_practice.title: Implement strStr()
coding_practice.description: Given two strings needle and haystack, return the index of the first occurrence of needle in haystack, or -1 if needle is not part of haystack.

examples.explanation:
"sad" occurs at index 0 and 6.
The first occurrence is at index 0, so we return 0.
"leeto" did not occur in "leetcode", so we return -1.

coding_practice.constraints:
1 <= haystack.length, needle.length <= 10^4
haystack and needle consist of only lowercase English characters.
coding_practice.explanation:
1. 若 needle 為空字串，返回 0。
2. 遍歷 haystack 的每個起始位置，檢查長度為 len(needle) 的子字串是否等於 needle。
3. 找到匹配返回索引，未找到返回 -1。
4. 時間複雜度 O((n-m+1)*m)，空間複雜度 O(1)。
